attributes.action: Do not close Lakenheath Village Home
attributes.additional_details:
Lakenheath Village Home is situated in the heart of the village of Lakenheath, opposite St.Mary's Church and within easy reach of the post office, village store, doctor's surgery, library and several other local amenities. Originally a vicarage, the house has been extended in order to provide ground floor 24 hour accommodation for 21 residential and respite care, in single rooms, tastefully decorated of the character you would expect from a late Georgian house.
The staff of Lakenheath Village Home are committed to providing the highest levels of quality care in a warm, homely environment that respects the individual's right and privacy, dignity and personal choice.
Recently it has been brought to everyones attention that this home may close - we will not let this happen!
